name: The Unease Of Breen
description:
Concept Summary: 

The Unease of Breen is an Isometric, roguelike dungeon crawler that uses the curse of sleep to reach ultimate abilities and powers. The story follows the protagonist Asden Heilig, a peasant with not much to his name; on a quest of immense difficulty to prove to his friend and to whom his serves, The Crown that he is more than just lazy, but an individual who suffers from prolonged drowsiness against his will.

 Explore the dungeons filled with monsters of Legend, as Asden learns to accept and benefit from his curse, and will he ultimately be able to return safely with redemption in hand?

Mechanics Summary:

Featuring Movement, Turn based combat, Randomly generated levels, Stores, Sleep meter,  Actions points for combat, Inventory and a Mini-map.
